alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 2:12PM MST until March 06 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches mainly between Park City, Heber and Kamas, with lesser amounts from Coalville north through the Ogden Valley. * WHERE...Wasatch Back, highest amounts near Park City, Kamas, and Heber. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected during the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
